chapter.text: I illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt, sbuccuaen Oebbi. IneS tagelda; ineS wannuz; Neppa Izmer i yal cci
Neppa ikwen Ixelqen; segwen ajehli, segwen lmumen. Oebbi Ipwali ayen txeddmem
Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep. Imsel ikwen, Iueggem amsal nnwen. £uoeS tu$alin
Ieoa i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Ieoa ayen teffrem akked wayen tennam. Oebbi Ieoa i illan deg idmaren
Ma iusa kwen id usali n wid illan, zik, d ijehliyen? Jeoben lwexda n tikli nnsen. Fellasen, aaaqeb aqeoean
Ayagi, imi sen ppasen imazanen nnsen s ubeggen. Nnan: "aani d amdan ara $ inhun"? D$a jehlen, xedaan. Ur Iclaa Oebbi. Oebbi d Asaay, d Amaazuz
Pputebten ijehliyen ar, d awez$i, ur d pnekkaren. Ini: "xaii! S Mass iw, ard a d tekkrem, sinna ard a ppepwaxebboem $ef wayen txeddmem"! Ayagi, i Oebbi, d ushil
Ihi, amnet s Oebbi akked Umazan iS, akked tafat id Nessers. Oebbi Ippuxebbeo $ef wayen txeddmem

Ass ideg ara kwen Issemlil, i wass ujemmel, ass nni, d ass um$uoou. Win iumnen s Oebbi, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ad as Ikkes tucmitin is, a t Issekcem ar leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad iwekkeo i lebda. D wagi ay d rrbee ameqwoaean
Wid ijehlen u inekoen issekniyen nne£, widak d at tmes, degs ad wekkoen. A taggara icemten
Ur d teppas twa$it, siwa ma Irad Oebbi. Win iumnen s Oebbi, ad Inhu ul is. Oebbi Ieoa yal cci
A$et awal i Oebbi, a$et awal i Umazan! Ma twexxoem, i iwatan kan, i Umazan nne£, siwa anabi ipbegginen
Oebbi, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. £ef Oebbi ara ppeklen lmumnin
A wid iumnen! S tidep, kra n tlawin nnwen akked tarwa nnwen, d icenga nnwen. Eadret iman nnwen segsen! Ma tsemmeem, teppum, tsemmeem, Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ayla nnwen akked dderya nnwen, d ahewwel kan, wanag, ar Oebbi, illa warraz ameqwoahan
Eezzbet i Oebbi ayen iwumi tzemrem. Eesset, oavit, seddqet! Yif it i iman nnwen. Wid ikksen ccea i iman nnsen, widak d imerbae
Ma toevlem i Oebbi aoeiial igerzen, ad awen d Irr sin imuren, ad awen Isemmee. Oebbi Iceffu, Ieellem
Amusnaw n wayen iffren akked wayen ivehoen, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
